about_the_game:
Crystal Cave is a labor of love from three passionate developers, designed to immerse you in a magical world that will linger in your heart long after you’ve finished playing.

Darkness has fallen over a once-prosperous kingdom, defeating its only protector — Princess Ailina. It’s up to you to step in and rescue the princess from her dark chains. To do so, you must overcome trials to obtain the magical flower Nilúria, which holds the key to saving Ailina and the entire kingdom.

What Awaits You:

  • Stunning Graphics:
    Explore the enchanting Forest of Dreams, where a green-clad wizard reveals your quest. In the Sunset Meadow, where the sun never sets, meet two more wizards and face their trials. First, you’ll guide the flow of water through darkness and light. Then, you’ll strategically place crates in their hidden shadows. Your journey culminates in the breathtaking Cave of the Moon Falls, where you can fill your flask with magical water before returning to the Forest of Dreams to complete your quest.

  • Engaging Dialogues:
    Uncover the deep secrets behind the kingdom’s power struggles. Perhaps the princess isn’t who she appears to be. Along the way, the World Bees will impart three important lessons.

  • Challenging Mini-Games:
    Experience simple yet satisfying mechanics like dragging objects and directing water flow. Hints are available to guide you, including shadows for crate placement and a full-fledged hint system in the water channeling mini-game.

  • A Short but Sweet Adventure:
    While the journey includes several mini-games, it’s designed to be completed in a concise and fulfilling playthrough.
.
